intro.description1: The app will collect data on your battery's condition to improve its efficiency and extend its battery life.
intro.description2: The app will display continuous battery health trends over specified time intervals.
intro.description3: We will find the optimal battery usage balance to ensure prolonged battery life and health.
intro.description4: So that we can better understand at what rate you are using up your battery - complete several tasks in advance.

saveMode.name: Save mode
saveMode.title: Enable Power Saving Mode
saveMode.description: Power saving mode limits background processes and reduces device performance to reduce power consumption.
saveMode.advice: Activate this mode when the battery level is low or when you need to extend the battery life of the device.

fullCharge.name: Full charge
fullCharge.title: Charge to 100%
fullCharge.description: Charge your device to 100% to calibrate the battery.
fullCharge.advice: Fully charging to 100% allows the device to calibrate the battery indicator. Avoid frequent full charging; maintain the charge level between 20% and 80%.

charging.name: Charging
charging.title: Do Not Use While Charging
charging.description: Leave the device alone while charging.
charging.advice: Avoid using the device while charging to prevent overheating and reduce charging efficiency.

switchOffConnections.name: Switch off connections
switchOffConnections.title: Disable Unused Connections
switchOffConnections.description: Turn off Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, and mobile connections when not in use.
switchOffConnections.advice: These connections consume energy even when not in use. Disable them to save battery.

lowBatteryLevel.name: Low battery
lowBatteryLevel.title: Charge at Low Levels
lowBatteryLevel.description: Open the app when the charge level is 20-25%.
lowBatteryLevel.advice: Charge your device as soon as the charge drops below 20% to avoid deep discharge.

highBatteryLevel.name: High battery
highBatteryLevel.title: Avoid Overcharging
highBatteryLevel.description: Open the app when the charge level is 80-85%.
highBatteryLevel.advice: Keeping the battery level between 20% and 80% can significantly extend its life and reduce degradation.

darkMode.name: Dark mode
darkMode.title: Enable Dark Mode
darkMode.description: Activate dark mode on your device.
darkMode.advice: Dark mode may not always save much battery but can reduce strain on your eyes in low-light environments.

optimizeScreenWork.name: Optimize screen work
optimizeScreenWork.title: Optimize Screen Brightness
optimizeScreenWork.description: Adjust screen brightness to an optimal level (20-30%).
optimizeScreenWork.advice: Reducing screen brightness can significantly reduce battery consumption, as the screen is one of the most energy-intensive components.
